name: Moon Commander
description:
Dependencies:

  • SDL2
  • SDL2_ttf
  • SDL2_mixer
  • Lua 5.3

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • Tab: Switch unit
  • WASD: Movement
  • E: Perform Action
  • Q: Switch Action
  • Mouse click: Shoot
  • ESC/P: Pause menu

Game Controller (is recommended over keyboard/mouse):

  • Right shoulder: Switch unit
  • Left joystick: Movement
  • Right joystick: Aim
  • Right trigger: Shoot
  • A: Perform Action
  • Left shoulder: Switch Action
  • Start: Pause menu

Source code (will be uploaded): https://gitlab.com/ErikWallstrom/Linux_Game_Jam_2019
